verbose_text: A number of studies suggest that HBx can activate signaling pathways of JAK / STAT, Ras-Raf-MAPK, p38MAPK, JNK, P13K, Src tyrosine kinase and Pyk-2 to induce host cell apoptosis.
evidence: HBx can activate signaling pathways of JAK/STAT, Ras-Raf-MAPK, p38MAPK, JNK, P13K, Src tyrosine kinase and Pyk-2
